body.p:
Frankfort Ky.
Executive Office
May 2d 1861
P. Swigert Esq
Prest Farmers Bank
Sir

I recd a telegram from N. Orleans this morning asking for Two hundred thousand Dollars to be placed to the credit to the credit of the State there in the citizens bank subject to the order of Hewit Norton & and Co the agents of the State of Ky to purchase arms munitions of war &c &c to put the State in a position of self defense Can I draw upon your Bk for your quota of the half million of Dollars asked for that purpose. Please answer as soon as possbile as they require an immediate answer. I go to Louisville on this evenings train -- Please answer me there -- If your answer is favorable I shall of course ask the Legislature to provide for its payment

With great respect
Yr frd. & obt. Servt
B. Magoffin
